meanings.definition: To irritate or inflame the skin at the side of a fingernail or toenail.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally agnail my finger while trying to trim my nails.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to agnail your toe when cutting your nails.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to enjoy trying to agnail my hand during playtime.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to agnail her emotions, causing her distress.
meanings.sent5: The constant friction agnail the skin, leading to discomfort and redness.
